thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Trina Fleck

author: Trina Fleck
title: Trina Fleck
text:
Everything was adjustable to my style! I enjoyed being able to choose from regular card or postcard style options! You can and change and adjust almost everything! Cards shipped really fast and we're great quality.
I got postcard style and was impressed with the thickness of the card! Color was great and photos looked exactly the way they should have! Very happy! Got my cards within 2 days of ordering!
